sentences: Tere hommikust! Kuidas sa terveks sai?
Pärast haigust ta naasis terveks kodusse.
Lapsele öeldi, et ta peab olema terveks pärasti operatsiooni.
context: The Estonian word 'terveks' is the illative case form of the adjective 'terve', which means healthy or well. It's used to indicate movement toward a state of being healthy, recovery, or becoming well. This grammatical case shows direction or purpose - something/someone becoming healthy or heading toward health.
